ygData.subject: Re: What is the benefit of Magic Resistance
ygData.msgSnippet: It all depends on what type of spells they are casting on you.  Root yes due to the fact it is a magic spell. Most of thier attacks I believe are fire and cold
ygData.messageBody:
It all depends on what type of spells they are casting on you. Root yes due
to the fact it is a magic spell.

Most of thier attacks I believe are fire and cold attacks so make sure you
have that up as well.

Druid lightning spell I believe is a magic attack. Same with thier swam
spells.

If I am wrong anyone please tell me

Jaxim



>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com

>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] What is the benefit of Magic Resistance

>
>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
>Just a general question. I am trying to understand the benefit of Magic
>Resistance.
>IF I am in a dual/fight with a wiz. What benefit will high magic resist
>give
>me?
>Will I resist root more often. More important will I take less damage from
>their bolts etc.
>
>Regards
>
>Nynenom
